    vimrc Plug 공유

    업데이트: July 06, 2020

    On This Page

    • Plug-Manager 설치
    • 주의
    • .vimrc 코드

    Plug-Manager 설치

    가이드에 따라서 설치해줘야 한다.

    vim-plug 설치

    주의

    명령어 vim ~/.vimrc

    • 주피터는 Plug 실패했다. 추후 수정해서 올리겠습니다.

    .vimrc 코드

    
"- For Neovim: stdpath('data') . '/plugged'
" - Avoid using standard Vim directory names like 'plugin'
call plug#begin('~/.vim/plugged')
" Make sure you use single quotes
set hlsearch
set backspace=indent,eol,start
set backspace=2  "compatible with version 5.4 and earlier
" Shorthand notation; fetches https://github.com/junegunn/vim-easy-align
Plug 'junegunn/vim-easy-align'
Plug 'vim-scripts/indentpython.vim'
Plug 'nvie/vim-flake8'
Plug 'jnurmine/Zenburn'
" Any valid git URL is allowed
Plug 'https://github.com/junegunn/vim-github-dashboard.git'
Plug 'https://github.com/raphamorim/lucario.git'
" airline
Plug 'https://github.com/vim-airline/vim-airline.git'
Plug 'vim-airline/vim-airline-themes'
Plug 'https://github.com/airblade/vim-gitgutter.git'

"jupyter
"Plug 'jupyter-vim/jupyter-vim'
"Plug 'jupyter-vim/jupyter-vim'
"Plug 'jpalardy/vim-slime', { 'for': 'python' }
"Plug 'hanschen/vim-ipython-cell', { 'for': 'python' }
Plug 'https://github.com/ivanov/vim-ipython.git'

"print(hex(.))
"Python syntax
"Plug 'https://github.com/vim-python/python-syntax.git'

"multiple cursor
Plug 'terryma/vim-multiple-cursors'

"vimshell
Plug 'Shougo/vimproc.vim', {'do' : 'make'}
Plug 'https://github.com/Shougo/vimshell.vim.git'

"fugitive
Plug 'https://github.com/tpope/vim-fugitive.git'

"tagbar
Plug 'https://github.com/majutsushi/tagbar.git'

"YouComplteMe
Plug 'https://github.com/ycm-core/YouCompleteMe.git'

"find  control + p
Plug 'ctrlpvim/ctrlp.vim'

"tagbar
Plug 'majutsushi/tagbar'

" Multiple Plug commands can be written in a single line using |   separators
Plug 'SirVer/ultisnips' | Plug 'honza/vim-snippets'

"syntatic 검사
Plug 'scrooloose/syntastic'

"systax hilighting
Plug 'kchmck/vim-coffee-script'

" On-demand loading
Plug 'scrooloose/nerdtree', { 'on':  'NERDTreeToggle' }
Plug 'tpope/vim-fireplace', { 'for': 'clojure' }
Plug 'preservim/nerdcommenter'

"gitgutter
Plug 'https://github.com/airblade/vim-gitgutter.git'


" Using a tagged release; wildcard allowed (requires git 1.9.2 or above)
Plug 'fatih/vim-go', { 'tag': '*' }
" Plugin options
Plug 'nsf/gocode', { 'tag': 'v.20150303', 'rtp': 'vim' }

" Plugin outside ~/.vim/plugged with post-update hook
Plug 'junegunn/fzf', { 'dir': '~/.fzf', 'do': './install --all' }

" Unmanaged plugin (manually installed and updated)
Plug '~/my-prototype-plugin'

" Initialize plugin system
call plug#end()

set hlsearch "set search hilighting
set fileencodings=utf-8 " set file encoding
set display+=lastline " Always try to show a paragraph
set title " set the window's title
"set termguicolors

"Python
"let NERDTreeIgnore=['\.pyc$', '\~$'] "ignore files in NERDTree
""colorscheme solarized
colorscheme lucario
set number
let g:go_version_warning = 0

"let g:ycm_server_python_interpreter = '/usr/bin/python3'
let g:ycm_global_ycm_extra_conf = '~/.vim/plugged/YouCompleteMe/third_party/ycmd/.ycm_extra_conf.py'
autocmd filetype cpp nnoremap <C-w> :w <bar> exec '!g++ '.shellescape('%').' -o '.shellescape('%:r').' && ./'.shellescape('%:r')<CR>

"Python syntax
"let g:python_highlight_all = 1

let g:ycm_confirm_extra_conf = 0
"To avoid conflict snippets
let g:ycm_key_list_select_completion = ['<C-j>', '<Down>']
let g:ycm_key_list_previous_completion = ['<C-k>', '<Up>']
let g:ycm_autoclose_preview_window_after_completion = 1
let g:ycm_server_python_interpreter = '/usr/local/bin/python3'

let g:NERDTreeDirArrowExpandable = '▸'
let g:NERDTreeDirArrowCollapsible = '▾'

"" 숨김파일 보이도록 처리
let NERDTreeShowHidden=1

nmap <C-a> :NERDTreeToggle<CR>
"autocmd filetype cpp nnoremap <C-w> :w <bar> exec '!g++ '.shellescape('%').'-o '.shellescape('%:r').' && ./'.shellescape('%:r')<CR>
nmap <C-e> :w<Enter>: !python3 %<Enter>

" <F1> 폴딩
map <F1> v]}zf
" <F2> 창이동
map <C-z> <C-w><C-w>

"::> <C-w><C-w>
map <F9> :bp<cr>
map <F10> :bn<cr>

nmap <C-d> :TagbarToggle<CR>
" <F7> shell
map <F7> :VimShell<cr>
"vim-multiple-cursor
" vim-multiple-cursor
let g:multi_cursor_use_default_mapping=0
" Default mapping
let g:multi_cursor_next_key='<C-n>'
let g:multi_cursor_prev_key='<C-p>'
let g:multi_cursor_skip_key='<C-x>'
let g:multi_cursor_quit_key='<Esc>'
"colorschem airline
let g:airline_theme='raven'

"find speed up
let g:ctrlp_custom_ignore = {
   \ 'dir':  '\.git$\|public$\|log$\|tmp$\|vendor$',
     \ 'file': '\v\.(exe|so|dll)$'
       \ }
" indent line
let g:indentLine_char_list = ['|', '¦', '┆', '┊']

" Highlight all instances of word under cursor, when idle.
" Useful when studying strange source code.
" Type z/ to toggle highlighting on/off.
nnoremap z/ :if AutoHighlightToggle()<Bar>set hls<Bar>endif<CR>
function! AutoHighlightToggle()
   let @/ = ''
   if exists('#auto_highlight')
     au! auto_highlight
     augroup! auto_highlight
     setl updatetime=4000
     echo 'Highlight current word: off'
     return 0
  else
    augroup auto_highlight
    au!
    au CursorHold * let @/ = '\V\<'.escape(expand('<cword>'), '\').'\>'
    augroup end
    setl updatetime=500
    echo 'Highlight current word: ON'
  return 1
 endif
endfunction

    감사합니다.

    태그: plug, vim

    업데이트: July 5, 2020
